source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video consists of a single, static shot of a breathtaking night landscape. The view looks out over a vast canyon under a sky filled with stars and a faint band of the Milky Way. The warm glow of a distant city is visible on the horizon, contrasting with the dark, silhouetted mountains.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: The camera smoothly zooms out throughout the shot, instead of being a static shot. The time-lapse video shows the starry sky slowly moving above. the shadow covers the ridged mountain gradually descends
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The video features a smooth zoom-out rather than a static shot. It is a time-lapse that captures the starry sky slowly moving above. Additionally, the shadow gradually descends over the ridged mountains.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: The video features a smooth zoom-out rather than a static shot. It is a time-lapse that captures the starry sky slowly moving above. Additionally, the shadow gradually descends over the ridged mountains.
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This video features a smooth zoom-out of a breathtaking night landscape. It is a time-lapse capturing the starry sky slowly moving above a vast canyon, with a faint band of the Milky Way. The warm glow of a distant city is visible on the horizon, contrasting with the dark, silhouetted mountains, as shadows gradually descend over the ridged terrain.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video features a smooth zoom-out of a breathtaking night landscape. It is a time-lapse capturing the starry sky slowly moving above a vast canyon, with a faint band of the Milky Way. The warm glow of a distant city is visible on the horizon, contrasting with the dark, silhouetted mountains, as shadows gradually descend over the ridged terrain.

generated_critique: The caption incorrectly describes the shot as static. It fails to mention the movement of the sky and omits the movement of the shadow on the mountains.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This video captures a breathtaking night landscape with a dynamic sky. The view looks out over a vast canyon under a sky filled with stars and a faint band of the Milky Way, slowly moving across the scene. The warm glow of a distant city is visible on the horizon, contrasting with the dark, silhouetted mountains, where shadows subtly shift as the night progresses.
